Step 1.Planning: Take the brisket out of the electric refrigerator

Step 2.Planning: Put the brisket on the chopping board

Step 3.Planning: Take the frying pan out of the shelf

Step 4.Planning: Put the frying pan on the oven

Step 5.Planning: Put the brisket in the frying pan

Step 6.Planning: Cook the brisket in the oven

Step 7.Planning: Remove the brisket from the oven
